      • calculateRewards

        void calculateRewards(User user)
        Calculate the rewards for a user. This method is running on several threads to be faster, using a forkJoinPool to invoke a recursiveTask called CalculatingRewardsTask which returns the elementRewards to add and an executorService to calculate rewardPoints from the rewardElements and add it to user
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose rewards are calculated

      • searchFiveClosestAttractions

        java.util.List<gpsUtil.location.Attraction> searchFiveClosestAttractions(gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation visitedLocation)
        Get a list of five attractions, the closest from the visitedLocation given in parameter
        Parameters:
        visitedLocation - the concerned visitedLocation
        Returns:
        a list of the five closest attractions

      • isNotInRewardsList

        boolean isNotInRewardsList(java.lang.String attractionName,
                           User user)
        Check if an attraction is not already present in a user's reward list
        Parameters:
        attractionName - the name of the attraction to check
        user - the user whose rewardsList is checked
        Returns:
        true if the attraction is not already in the userReward list, false otherwise

      • nearAttraction

        boolean nearAttraction(gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation visitedLocation,
                       gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction)
        Check if an attraction is closer than the proximityBuffer from a visitedLocation
        Parameters:
        visitedLocation - the visitedLocation to check
        attraction - the attraction to check
        Returns:
        true if the attraction closer than the proximityBuffer from the visitedLocation, false otherwise

      • getRewardPoints

        int getRewardPoints(gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction,
                    User user)
        Get a number of points to attribute to a user for visiting an attraction
        Parameters:
        user - the concerned user
        attraction - the concerned attraction
        Returns:
        an int which is the number of points to attribute

        Calculate the distance in miles between 2 locations
        Parameters:

        Returns:
